About Me

Hello, I am a current undergraduate student pursuing a degree in Computer Science at UC Berkeley. Besides being all nerdy, or aka being an engineer who is able to solve problems you didn't know you had in ways you can't understand, I have a lot of other hobbies.

  • 1. I love to cook, especially good, traditional, shanghainese cuisine

  • 2. I play badminton, although not competitively, as in being in the national team, but I deem myself decently good. So definately hit me up.

  • 3. I like to go out on hikes, adventures

  • 4. A lot others, feel free to email me
